entry.title: SMOG WARNING , Otterburn Park
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:32 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
